column4: When I install Ubuntu 8.04, is there a way to manually choose packages to install and not? For example, can I completely skip Gnome?
When I install Ubuntu 8.04, is there a way to manually choose packages to install and not? For example, can I completely skip Gnome?
Guess I'll have to use server install, then?
Alternate CD can install a GUI-less box too.  If you've got it already
